definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: The Chief Executive may, as he or she deems necessary, invite other persons concerned to sit in on meetings of the Council.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官认为必要时可邀请有关人士列席会议。

sentences.english: That includes Shell, its chief executive said last month.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括壳牌，其行政长官上个月说。

sentences.english: Hong Kong's chief executive, Donald Tsang, condemned the acts as 'cold-blooded and malicious.
sentences.chinese: 香港行政长官曾荫权谴责镪水袭击行为“冷血恶毒”。

sentences.english: How will the Chief Executive handle natural or man-made disasters?
sentences.chinese: 行政长官应该如何应对和处理天灾人祸？

sentences.english: The Chief Executive must consult the Executive Council before dissolving the Legislative Council.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官在解散立法会前，须征询行政会议的意见。

sentences.english: During the period of vacancy, his or her duties shall be assumed according to the provisions of the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官缺位期间的职务代理，依照上款规定管理。

sentences.english: According to "Zuo Zhuan", Governor Hua was a magistrate who assisted the king to rule the country in the Song State.
sentences.chinese: 华督是《左传》记载的宋国辅佐国君的行政长官。

sentences.english: Executive authority is vested in a Governor, popularly elected for a four-year term.
sentences.chinese: 行政权被授予了一位被选举的行政长官，任期为四年。

sentences.english: Anna Maria Cancellieri, a former prefect, becomes interior minister.
sentences.chinese: 其中前任地方行政长官安娜玛利亚提拔为内政部长。

sentences.english: Courts and magistrates may be set up but they cannot function without sheriffs and constables.
sentences.chinese: 宫廷和地方行政长官没有县吏和皂吏就不能办事。

sentences.english: Article 56 The Executive Council of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region shall be presided over by the Chief Executive.
sentences.chinese: 第半百六条香港出格行政区行政会议由行政长官主持。

sentences.english: They robbed the Commissioner of his car.
sentences.chinese: 他们抢走了行政长官的小车。

sentences.english: As the chief administrator of the United Nations, the Secretary-General has an important role to play.
sentences.chinese: 秘书长是联合国最高行政长官，作用重要。

sentences.english: On June 12, he met with local prefect Gheorghe Martin in Constanta.
sentences.chinese: 12日，他在康斯坦察会见了地方行政长官马丁。

sentences.english: Chief Executive Donald Tsang meets FEHD directors.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官曾荫权会见本署署长级官员。

sentences.english: Signing of an agreement of co-operation between the World Scout Organization and United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.
sentences.chinese: 与联合国的高级行政长官签署一份协助难民的文件。

definition: chief executive of Special Administrative Region (Hong Kong or Macao)/abbr. for 特別行政區首席執行官|特别行政区首席执行官
Leung Chun-ying (1954-), 3rd Chief Executive of Hong Kong
to set apart/to assign sb to a job

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia

Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (abbr. for 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室|中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室[Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4]) or the equivalent office in Macao
